EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation Plant
Located near water source at (-3.5, 27.5), consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5) facing up
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0) with coal fuel
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Connected via pipe network
Status: Operational but steam engine not connected to power network

- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Water and Entity Placement Issues
- When placing boilers near water, ensure the entire footprint of the boiler is on solid ground and not overlapping with water tiles
- Check for existing entities before attempting to place new ones in an area

### Connection Issues
- Ensure you have the required items (like pipes) in inventory before attempting to connect entities
- When connecting entities with pipes, ensure there is a clear path between connection points

### Power Network Issues
- Steam engines need to be connected to power poles to function properly
- Ensure proper spacing between power infrastructure components for connections to work

### Entity Orientation Issues
- Pay attention to the direction entities are facing when placing them
- Consider the flow direction needed for fluids when placing pumps, boilers and steam engines

### Resource Management
- Ensure all powered entities (burner inserters, mining drills) have sufficient fuel
- Keep track of inventory requirements for crafting and building
